attributes.action: order the Home Office to instigate a criminal investigation into BT and Phorm.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
British Telecom and Phorm have admitted to carrying out a secret trial in July last year without the consent of those users involved in the trials.

This potentially means they may have  contravened section 1 of the Regulation of Investigatory Powers Act 2000 which is a criminal offence.

We call on the Prime Minister to order the Home Office and CPS to investigate the possibility of bringing criminal charges againt BT and Phorm.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
